about_the_game:
Welcome to the Animal Mayhem! 

Hey everyone, welcome to Pao Pao! Here, you’re running a restaurant, but not just any restaurant—this one’s staffed and visited by the coolest animals around, from a giant chef cat to a sly fox and a hilarious raccoon! Get ready for some wild kitchen action: catching fish, gathering ingredients, and serving up orders faster than you can blink. Go solo or bring up to 4 friends to join the animal madness. 

Animals, chaos, and loads of fun

In Pao Pao, there’s a whole little town to explore, where you can cook, fish, and expand your restaurant with greenhouses, aquariums, and more. Every day brings new orders and new faces, and at night, you can kick back and prep for the next round of culinary chaos!

New places, new animals, new laughs

As you level up, you’ll unlock new spots—from cozy cafes to bustling bakeries. Each place is unique, bringing new animals, recipes, and hilarious mini-games. These new areas roll out with updates, so there’s always something fresh to dive into. Ready to become an animal restaurant mogul?

For solo players and party people alike

Want to play solo? Go for it! But with friends (up to 4), it’s an absolute blast! Embrace the chaos—timing, mini-games, teamwork, and all. Each player’s got their own style, but everyone’s in this together, racing against the clock for the ultimate kitchen win!

Endless animal fun

With new locations, features, and furry friends, Pao Pao isn’t just a game; it’s pure joy! Build your animal restaurant paradise and enjoy the ultimate culinary chaos with the coolest animal crew around!

name: Pao Pao

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel i3-10100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to Pao Pao! You’re the boss, the cat’s the chef, and together you're cooking up chaos! Cook, upgrade the restaurant, and bring your friends along for the fun. Ready for some purr-fect madness?
